page.title: 11A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: I wake up at ten to eight; get washed and dressed. At ten past eight I have my breakfast (Cornflakes, toast and tea or boiled egg). At twenty past eight I leave for school. I meet my friends in the playground and we play until nine o'clock.Then we go in to school and have Assembly. We have some hymns, some prayers and perhaps a story about Jesus. We do English,Mathematics,Social Studies, Physical Education and Religious Knowledge among other things.We have a cooked dinner in school.Then we go out to play rounders.When we come in we might have handwork or Nature Study. At 3.30 the afternoon bell goes and we can go home.We play games outside if it is fine then we have our tea,watch television, have a bath and go to bed.
